title: The tragedy of Hoffman or A reuenge for a father As it hath bin diuers times acted with great applause, at the Phenix in Druery-lane.
author: Chettle, Henry, d. 1607?
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I[ohn] N[orton] for Hugh Perry, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the signe of the Harrow in Brittaines-burse,
